item.title: How do i code in ::rules to my server help me
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

You didn’t read the whole post -_-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2008, 12:28:09 am[/size][hr]If you even can’t find commands in client.java then search for the commands name like “help”
And search is ctrl + f.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2008, 12:29:11 am[/size][hr][quote=“sasanated32, post:3, topic:222583”]Where do i add it??[/quote]client.java

item.title: How do i code in ::rules to my server help me
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Add a command like this: [code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rules”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dre@The rules of Suomirune", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@red@READ ALL OF THE RULES!", 8146);
sendQuest("@blu@READ ALL OF THESE RULES!!!", 8147);
sendQuest(“Rule 1: Don’t attack shop NPC’s!”, 8148);
sendQuest(“Rule 2: Do Not Ever use NOCLIP OR ULL BE BANED”, 8149);
sendQuest(“Rule 3: No doing meteor shower in ::home or ::pk”, 8150);
sendQuest(“Rule 4: No making a summon/pet army then attackign ppl”, 8151);
sendQuest(“Rule 5: No hacking!”, 8152);
sendQuest(“Rule 6: Must obey any mod or admins”, 8153);
sendQuest(“Rule 7: No disobeying Mods or Admins! Unless they abusing!”, 8154);
sendQuest(“Rule 8: No asking for free Mod or Admin!”, 8155);
sendQuest("@blu@You have to kill modboss for mod", 8156);
sendQuest("@blu@And adminboss for admin and only 1 can be admin in a day", 8157);
sendQuest(“Rule 9: No set-item, set-npc, or set-object!(Auto-ban!)”, 8158);
sendQuest(“Rule 10: No bothering admins or owners when they are busy!”, 8159);
sendQuest(“Rule 11: No whining or complaining!”, 8160);
sendQuest(“Rule 12: No asking for free co-owner!”, 8161);
sendQuest(“Rule 13: No asking for unban!”, 8162);
sendQuest(“Rule 14: No attacking allies in clan wars!”, 8163);
sendQuest(“Rule 15: No scamming or jealousy (’‘this serv sucks’’)”, 8164);
sendQuest(“Rule 16: No pking in kalphite or dark hole, unless its a duel”, 8165);
sendQuest(“Rule 17: No using too much 99 spell!”, 8166);
sendQuest("@blu@Rule 18: No constructing in ::home ::pk ::kalphite ::wild1-10!", 8167);
sendQuest("@dre@Report abusing mods by telling an admin or other mod via", 8168);
sendQuest("@dre@private chat, ::tell, ::yell!", 8169);
sendQuest("@cya@ENJOY MY SERVER!!! =) and have a free 1mil!", 8170);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
addItem(995, 1000000);
}

[/code]
Add it under another command. And commands are in client.java if you didn’t know that.
